fields.message:
This area is related to the miscellaneous settings.

sub_fields.label: 9.1.6. Custom Icon - Hover State
sub_fields.name: custom-icon--hover
sub_fields.instructions: If set, this image will appear when pointing on the  custom icon (9.1.4.) with your mouse cursor.

sub_fields.label: 5.1.2. Social Links Options
sub_fields.name: flo-social-links
sub_fields.instructions: NOTE! The font icons are available for the following services: Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Yahoo, Dribbble, Linkedin, Vimeo, YouTube, Tumblr, Delicious, Flickr, Instagram, Pinterest, Email. For any other social profiles you'll have to upload custom image icons.

sub_fields.label: Comment Type
sub_fields.name: flo-cube-blog-post__comments
sub_fields.instructions: If both comment types are enabled, you can change their order by simply dragging them around.

sub_fields.message: To modify the font styles of the form elements, such as the "Add Comment" button and the input fields, please go to Flotheme -> 5. Generics -> 5.3. Generic Typography.
sub_fields.label: D. Form Typography

fields.label: 5.5.3.1. Disable Fading Effect
fields.name: flo-cube-setions__fade-effect-disable
fields.instructions: Disable the fading effect when scrolling through pages.

fields.label: 5.5.3.2. Disable Fading Effect on tablet
fields.name: flo-cube-setings__tablet-fade-effect-disable
fields.instructions: Disable the fading effect when scrolling through pages.

fields.label: 5.5.3.3. Disable Fading Effect on mobile
fields.name: flo-cube-setings__mobile-fade-effect-disable
fields.instructions: Disable the fading effect when scrolling through pages.
